"turning a list of numbers separated by line breaks into a line i have this code which is supposed to add pairs of numbers and print out new numbers. ..var a = [580563, 750269, 127553, 478126, 490797, 919298, 440977, 549169, 935253, 48340, 605950, 859831, 26818, 336881, 438690];.var b = [498030, 704160, 346646, 544826, 898396, 192725, 382888, 590117, 172659, 534225, 592230, 235547, 502236, 327531, 405165];..for (var i = 0; i &lt; a.length; i++) {.    var k = a[i] + b[i];.    console.log(k);.}...this returns this: ..1078593.1454429.474199.1022952.1389193.1112023.823865.1139286.1107912.582565.1198180.1095378.529054.664412.843855...how do i turn it into this: ..1078593 1454429 474199 1022952 1389193 1112023 823865 1139286 1107912 582565 1198180 1095378 529054 664412 843855...thanks!"
